title: Kristin's Jaw Dropped When She Saw This Pic Of One Of Her Husband's Exes
description:
Yesterday on the show, we talked to a listener who was creeped out after finding out his exes looked like her exact doppelgängers! And while we were talking about what our significant other's exes look like, it came out that Kristin had NEVER seen any of Bart's exes, so she had no idea what they looked like.
Well, Bart sent us the names of some of her exes and our Social Media Producer Rebecca did some hardcore internet sleuthing...and found them. We're gonna reveal them to Kristin for the first time EVER...while we're live on the air!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
